ComicInfo.Title: Blood of the Lamb, Part 6
ComicInfo.Summary:
Patience Confronts the Anti-Christ!
The moment Patience has been dreading has arrived. Slaying demons and battling evil cult members is righteous. Rebelling against a Church hierarchy she knows is corrupt is virtuous. But now, faced with executing a young boy who may bring about the end of the world, Patience will discover how far she's willing to go to wield the Spear of Destiny and bear the mantle of Magdalenaâ€¦
ComicInfo.Penciller: David Marquez,Nelson Blake II,David Marquez,Nelson Blake II
